price: (Nkͻmhyεni), gye Soadaqa (Zaka) firi wͻn agyapadeε no mu, na fate wͻn ho na fa yε wͻn kronkron, na bͻ mpaeε ma wͻn. Nokorε sε, wo mpaebͻ no yε awerεkyekyerε ma wͻn; Nyankopͻn na Ɔte biribiara, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ a Ɔnim biribiara.
arabic: خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ صَدَقَةٗ تُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٞ لَّهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: khudh min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum watuzakkīhim bihā waṣalli ʿalayhim inna ṣalataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
